name: Mother Mary
description:
This is an entry for Themed Horror Game Jam #2!

Welcome to Mother Mary, where you play as a young girl who wakes up in a back room of a mega church! With no memory and no way to escape, she must explore the facility and find out this place's dark secret while avoiding security guards!

CONTROLS: WASD to move, space to interact, and mouse movements control the camera. You can interact with anything that has particles emitting from it. 

Be sure to check out the 'content warning' text file! Thank you so much for playing!
